Thunderstorms drench area

The National Weather Service reported the storms are moving southeast at 25 miles per hour, producing hail, frequent lightning and torrential rain. (Globe, 3:48 p.m.)

  • Video forecast Severe thunderstorm watch on

Boston named world's 9th best beer city

Zane Lamprey, host of television shows "Three Sheets" and "Drinking Made Easy," counted down the 25 best beer cities in the world, and Boston finished 9th.

Coakley seeks to strike part of DOMA

Martha Coakley has asked the Supreme Court to uphold a Boston appeals court ruling that struck down a portion of the Defense of Marriage Act. (Globe, 1:47 p.m.)
  • 5/31 Boston court rules DOMA unconstitutional | Excerpt

Mass. lottery hits sales record of $4.74b

The Massachusetts State Lottery is crediting the sales increase to savvy management and a warm winter that allowed people to get out and gamble. (Globe, 12:33 p.m.)
